entry.title: UPDATE: We're investigating reports of an issue with Gmail. We will provide more information shortly.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2023-02-22 04:50 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

Our engineering team is currently working in partnership with the Microsoft team to investigate the email sync issue via IMAP.

Update: Microsoft team has acknowledged that other large mail providers beyond Gmail are also not able to sync with Microsoft's IMAP server. They are working on the issue.

We will provide an update by Wednesday, 2023-02-22 18:00 US/Pacific with current details.

Impact Details:

IMAP syncs with Microsoft servers are experiencing failures causing sync issues with Gmail application.

Customers accessing Outlook or Hotmail email accounts on Gmail application across all device platforms are unable to sync new messages.

Affected products: Gmail

entry.title: UPDATE: We're investigating reports of an issue with Gmail. We will provide more information shortly.

Impact Details:

IMAP syncs with Microsoft servers are experiencing failures causing sync issues with Gmail application.

Customers accessing Outlook or Hotmail email accounts on Gmail application across all device platforms are unable to sync new messages.

Affected products: Gmail

entry.title: Incident: Errors when running workflows
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On February 22nd, 2023 from 08:44 AM PST to 09:22 AM PST, some users experienced issues with using workflows.
We discovered an issue that prevented workflow API calls from successfully writing changes to our database. After restarting this process, workflow functionality was restored for all impacted users.
We continued monitoring our metrics and announced the resolution when we were confident the issue was resolved.
If you continue to run into any issues please feel free to reach out to our support team.

entry.title: UPDATE: We're investigating reports of an issue with Gmail. We will provide more information shortly.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2023-02-22 04:50 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

The investigation so far from our engineering has not uncovered any issues with Gmail application authentication and we are continuing to investigate further for the root cause.

We will provide an update by Wednesday, 2023-02-22 13:30 US/Pacific with current details.

Impact details: IMAP syncs with Microsoft servers are experiencing failures causing sync issues with Gmail application.

Customers accessing Outlook or Hotmail email accounts on Gmail application across all device platforms are unable to sync new messages.

Affected products: Gmail

entry.title: Incident: Some customers are experiencing server errors with the GitHub Enterprise Server app
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Monday February 20th 2023 at 15:00 PST until Tuesday February 21st 2023 22:00 PST,
A PR that changed the type of an argument used by the Github plugin was pushed to production. This change caused a type mismatch and subsequently HTTP 500 errors. The issue was resolved once the PR was reverted.
We're very sorry for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Incident: Issues with mobile notifications for Enterprise Grid customers
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Tuesday, February 14th, 2023 at 09:52 AM PST until Tuesday, February 21st, 2023 at 08:56 AM PST, some enterprise customers experienced issues with the delivery of mobile notifications on Android devices.
Our team identified that the cause of the issue was linked to a recent change with notification clearing. We rolled back this change which fixed the issue.
We're very sorry for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers are having issues loading the admin page
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From February 14th, 2023 at 10:49AM PST until February 20th, 2023 at 1:16 AM PST some customers were unable to load their workspace's admin page. We traced this issue to a recent code change, which resulted in the workspace token being invalidated when visiting the admin page from a browser. Reverting this code change fixed the issue for all affected customers.

entry.title: Incident: Files upload API not uploading files to thread
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On Tuesday February 14th, 2023 from 1:19 AM PST to 3:50 AM PST some customers reported an issue where the API method files.upload created a new message instead of uploading files in a thread.
Our team identified that the cause of the issue was linked to a recent update. This change was rolled back which fixed the issue.
Note: This summary has been edited since its initial posting to better align with Slack's communication guidelines.

entry.title: Incident: Threads are currently not loading for some users
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On Monday February 13th, 2023 at 07:00PM to Tuesday February 14th, 2023 at 01:02 AM PST, customers were unable to view threads in public channels they had not joined. This was caused by a recent code change - we've deployed a correction to this and the issue is now resolved.
Should customers continue to experience this behaviour, a hard refresh of the Slack client will fix this.

entry.title: Performance Issues
entry.summary: Feb 13, 08:36 PST Resolved - Engineering has implemented mitigations, which should have resolved performance issues. We’ll continue to monitor performance and provide updates if we run into issues again. We found that page analytics events, such as page views and page edits, did not save during the time of this incident. Impacted users may see their page related analytics as undercounted for February 13, 2023. Our team is looking into how we can prevent this from happening in the future. We appreciate your patience while we work on making these improvements. Feb 13, 08:17 PST Investigating - Notion users may experience general performance slowness. Engineering is currently investigating and implementing mitigations.

entry.title: Issues Affecting Guest Name Parameters in Webhooks
entry.summary: Feb 9, 17:43 PST Resolved - A fix has been implemented as of Feb 9, 10:00 UTC and webhooks should be returning names in full as expected. We have been monitoring the situation since, and have marked the incident as resolved as of Feb 9, 20:10 UTC. Do let us know via the Partner Portal if still experiencing issues. We deeply regret this incident and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Feb 9, 02:54 PST Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue. In the event reservation webhook notifications are still returning only initials for the guest name parameters, please attempt a GET reservations request. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and are working towards a resolution. Feb 8, 21:42 PST Investigating - We are currently investigating issues with webhooks where guest name parameters are not returning the names in full. We will provide further updates as we learn more. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.

entry.title: Centralized inbox filters
entry.summary:
Improvement
Sounds impossible to find a guest message in seconds ? As we keep improving our features, we work closely with property users and managers like yourself to learn how we can help you run your business more efficiently. After several workshops, reflections, and feedback, our Smily team did several adjustments to help you use our centralized Inbox in order to simplify this daily communication. We added several filters to help you find the conversations easily in the Inbox, you can now filter by the following criterias: Conversation status Assignee Guest Booking stage Booking status Rental Booking tag Rental tag
This way you can find the exact conversation you are looking for in a matter of seconds :) For more details please see the article from our manual Wishing you all a pleasant day!

author.name: Yannick, Customer Care Team Leader - Pro Team

entry.title: Incident: Errors running workflows
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 31, 2023 from 11:40 AM PST to 11:55 AM PST, customers may have experienced issues with workflows not running as expected or posting duplicate messages.
A network event prevented access to some of the database servers that support workflows. This disruption meant that the remaining servers were unable to handle the workflow load.
We restarted the affected servers and manually increased the capacity to resolve the issue, restoring normal workflow behaviour.

entry.title: Incident: Users unable to enter team name when creating a workspace
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 31, 2023 from 9:44 AM to 3:17 PM PST, some customers may have experienced issues creating new workspaces.
An error in our onboarding flow meant we were incorrectly assuming new workspaces had completed the onboarding process before any onboarding actually took place, leaving these newly created workspaces in an unusable limbo state. We reverted the change that caused the initial onboarding inconsistencies, then released a fix to resolve some dependencies from the reverted file.
Everyone should be able to create new workspaces as normal once again, although you may experience some overzealous onboarding prompts as the system resolves any lingering inconsistencies.

We will provide updates as necessary. Jan 26, 16:15 CET Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Tuesday 31st of January, between 5 AM and 7 AM CEST, when you can expect few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services might be potentially affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: Notice: Some users having trouble with custom emoji.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 25, 2023, from 2:41 PM PST to 6:17 PM PST, some customers may have experienced custom emojis failing to load.
We traced this back to a recent configuration change. When we rolled back the configuration, the problem was resolved for all affected customers.

entry.title: Incident with API Requests and Pull Requests
entry.summary: Jan 26, 00:38 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 25, 23:59 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for API Requests and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Outage: Users having issues loading Slack
entry.summary:
Issue summary: On January 25, 2023 from 7:20 AM PDT to 7:46 AM PDT, some users experienced problems loading messages and threads, previewing files and sending messages in Slack. We traced this issue to a recent internal change and started reverting it immediately. Once this was reverted, the issue was resolved for all impacted users.
Note: We've edited the times in this summary to correct an error made in the initial version posted.

entry.title: Incident: Workflows using 'Message thread' are failing for Japanese users.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From January 24, 2023 at 5:30 PM PST until January 24, 2023 at 10:20 PM PST, some customers who were using Slack in Japanese experienced a failure when using the "Send message to a thread" workflow step.
We identified that this was caused by an earlier change we made to workflows and fixed the issue by reverting the earlier change.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Jan 25, 10:39 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 25, 10:13 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of issues with Actions. This looks related to Azure networking issue which is impacting multiple regions. We are seeing improvements and will continue to monitor this. Jan 25, 09:14 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions, API Requests, Codespaces and Copilot
entry.summary: Jan 25, 09:10 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 25, 08:30 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of issues with service(s): multiple services. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation. Jan 25, 08:04 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one. Jan 25, 07:54 UTC Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate. Jan 25, 07:53 UTC Update - API Requests is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one. Jan 25, 07:53 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Copilot.

entry.title: Incident: Threads, direct messages, and channels are currently not loading
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On January 24, 2023, from 5:50 AM to 9:30 AM PST, some customers experienced errors when opening threads and saw blank channels and direct message histories.
We traced this issue to an unexpected spike in a database load. We made a configuration change that restored full functionality to threads and conversations for all impacted users.
We are investigating ways to prevent this from occurring in the future.
You may need to reload Slack (Command/Ctrl + Shift + R) in order for the fix to be reflected on your end. We're sorry for the disruption we brought to your day.

entry.title: Incident: Some customers may be encountering an error code when opening a workflow in a new window
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
From January 23, 2023 at 3:00 PM PST to January 24, 2023 at 7:02 AM PST some customers encountered an error when opening a workflow in a new window.
We determined this issue was caused by a recent change to how Slack handles additional windows. This change was reverted and the issue was corrected.
